author: Toni Morrison
description: Tells the story of a dysfunctional family of formerly enslaved people whose Cincinnati home is haunted by a malevolent spirit.

description: Some kind of copy of a famous book
title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

author: Joseph Heller
description: Often cited as one of the most significant novels of the twentieth century, it uses a distinctive non-chronological third-person omniscient narration, describing events from the points of view of different characters.
title: Catch-22

description: A fantasy adventure about a hobbit's journey
